segments.text: Daddy , do you mind helping me prepare the supplies for mountain climbing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it gonna to rain tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have checked the weather report . It says it will be cloudy , but no rain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just take my umbrella in case of rain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Daniel , don't forget to take enough water and food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely , or else , I will starve to death halfway up the mountain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Daddy , may I take your compass ? I feel so cool with it in my hand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Oh , I nearly forgotten , I left my sneakers at my office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn't matter . I can go with you to the supermarket to pick up a new pair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , after we finish our preparation , we'll go to the supermarket .
segments.speaker: S2
